title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions

tosdr.case: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
tosdr.tldr: When installing the Facebook app on an Android phone, it allows access to the audio record path and to take pictures with the camera. This allows the application at any time to collect images the camera is seeing.
